0: Staff are outstanding polite helpful and nothing seems to be too much trouble for them

The pools and beaches were comfortable and clean with plenty of staff to attend to your every need
Every staff member is part of Ritz experience where they greet you on the pathways are always extremely friendly and helpful
The service was excellent from check in to check out
Friendliest staff we have ever seen
The staff at the beach were so helpful and friendly
The Ritz team is first class all the way
I paddle boarded for the first time and the employees were very helpful
1: No bar service at pool or beach
